meanings.definition: A period of time that is added to the lunar year to bring it into line with the solar year.
meanings.sent1: During ancient times, people used epacts to adjust their lunar calendars.
meanings.sent2: The epacts were crucial for aligning the lunar and solar cycles.
meanings.sent3: The epacts decided when the harvest festival would be celebrated.
meanings.sent4: The epacts acted as a bridge between the lunar and solar measurements.
meanings.sent5: Learning about epacts helped the students understand the calendar better.

meanings.definition: The age of the moon at the beginning of the calendar year.
meanings.sent1: The epacts determined the starting point of the lunar calendar.
meanings.sent2: At the epacts, people would plan their planting season.
meanings.sent3: The epacts at the new year brought excitement to the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The epacts marked the moon's journey from old to new.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the concept of epacts in astronomy class.
